system.abilityDescription: Once a hunt, you can throw yourself to the ground. While in this state humans, sins, and exorcists will treat you as if you were dead, severely ill, or unconscious. It may distract them, and they wonâ€™t target you in a conflict scene. You immediately end this effect by doing anything that would require an action roll, or it ends at the end of the scene. It only works once on the same target ever.
